body.p:
WAR DEPARTMENT,
ADJUTANT GENERAL'S OFFICE.
Washington, January 3d, 1865.

49. Private Thomas Rigdon, Company "D," 11th Kentucky Cavalry, an escaped Prisoner of War, will report in person to the Commanding Officer of his regiment for duty, with permission to delay en route thirty days.
The Quartermaster's Department will furnish the necessary transportation.

By order of the Secretary of War:
E. D. TOWNSEND,
Assitatn Adjutant General.

OFFICIAL:
E D Townsend
Assistant Adjutant General.

11 Cavy
Rigdon Thomas
Private
Order
to report to Regt with leave to delay 30 days en route
Recd A. G. O. Jany 13. 1865
